channel.title: Docker on Joseph Courtney
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Joseph Courtney

item.title: FastAPI Kubernetes infratructure with Terraform deployment
item.description: The backend of this project is written in Python using the FastAPI framework and runs on the official python:3.10.7-slim-bullseye Docker image. The frontend of my project is written in JavaScript using the React JS and Tailwind CSS frameworks.
